channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stellantis warns of $2.7 billion loss for 1st half of 2025 due to tariffs and some big charges
Dramatic video shows people in water after Indonesian passenger ferry catches fire at sea
Trump Media stock surges after acquiring $2 billion of bitcoin
Germany outlines drone and Patriot plan for Ukraine
FDA names former pharmaceutical company executive to oversee US drug program
Texas flooding: Governor calls special legislative session for emergency planning
item.description: "We must ensure better preparation in the future," Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said in a statement posted on social media.

item.title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals
item.description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, we show you items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage...

item.description: Tony and Grammy winner Billy Porter joins "CBS Mornings" to talk about stepping into the role of the Emcee in Cabaret, a dream three decades in the ma...

item.title: From organ donation to innovation, 2 lives transformed by purpose
item.description: David Begnaud shares the stories of Brian Flynn, who made two living organ donations to save strangers and Rachel Bee, a teen who turned her Crohn's d...

item.title: Shark attack survivor Paul de Gelder teaches others how to stay alive if attacked
item.description: Paul de Gelder, who lost his hand and leg in a 2009 shark attack, joins "CBS Mornings" to talk about his new Discovery Channel special, "How to Surviv...

item.title: Moscow and Kyiv rocked by drone strikes as leaders position for fresh talks
item.description: Russia and Ukraine again exchanged a series of major overnight drone strikes as the two sides maneuvered ahead of a possible resumption of ceasefire t...

item.title: WATCH: Inside Ukraine's drone school for kids
item.description: ABC News meets the Ukrainian students learning drone piloting skills that soldiers are using on the battlefield.

item.title: Microsoft releases emergency fix for Sharepoint after cyberattacks
item.description: Microsoft issued an urgent fix after hackers used a "zero-day" exploit to infiltrate its SharePoint software.

item.title: Ford recalls more than 694K Bronco Sport, Escape vehicles due to fuel injector issue
item.description: Ford is recalling more than 694,000 Bronco Sport and Escape vehicles because the fuel injector may crack and leak, which may cause a fire

item.title: D-Day veteran and TikTok star ‘Papa Jake’ Larson dies at 102
Suspect arrested after car crashes into post office and catches fire in San Jose, California
item.description: Authorities say a suspect was arrested after a car crashed into a post office in San Jose, California, causing the building to go up in flames.

item.title: Suspect in Los Angeles car-ramming incident has a criminal history and was on parole, police say
WATCH: Bronx Zoo debuts baby squirrel monkeys
item.description: The Bronx Zoo debuted a pair of baby squirrel monkeys who were seen roaming the enclosure on their mothers' backs.
